title: CEC to announce election schedule at 6pm tomorrow: EC secretary
body: Chief Election Commissioner (CEC) AMM Nasir Uddin will announce the schedule of the 13th national election tomorrow. "While addressing the nation at 6:00pm, tomorrow, the CEC will announce the election schedule," Senior Election Commission Secretary Akhtar Ahmed told reporters at a briefing at the Nirbachon Bhaban today. Akhtar Ahmed earlier said, the Election Commission (EC) is set to record the CEC's address today. Earlier in the day, the EC briefed President Mohammed Shahabuddin on preparations for holding the 13th national parliamentary election and the referendum on the same day. The CEC and the four commissioners met the president at Bangabhaban around 12:30pm. According to the EC secretary, the president sought detailed explanations on arrangements for holding two votes on the same day -- the national election and the referendum -- including ballot designs, mock voting experiences and vote counting procedures.
